Returns whether the specified movement command(s) are starting the next frame. Use caution when using this for anything player animation-related, some commands may require the movement state to be truly active (wait until next update)

◆ ApplySplint()

void ManBase::ApplySplint ( )
inlineprivate

Definition at line 1828 of file playerbase.c.

1829 {
1830 float add_health_coef = 0.33;
1831 // The idea is to slightly increase health of broken limb so the player is still limping. Using more splints will help but each time less. 100% recovery can be achieved only through long term healing.
1832 if (GetBrokenLegs() == eBrokenLegs.BROKEN_LEGS)
1833 {
1834 AddHealth("LeftLeg", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") - GetHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1835 AddHealth("RightLeg", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("RightLeg", "Health") - GetHealth("RightLeg", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1836 AddHealth("RightFoot", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("RightFoot", "Health") - GetHealth("RightFoot", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1837 AddHealth("LeftFoot", "Health", ( GetMaxHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") - GetHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") ) * add_health_coef );
1838 }
1839 }

3370 if ( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_PRONE && m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx != DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDPRONE )
3371 {
3372 float avgLegHealth = GetHealth("RightLeg","") + GetHealth("LeftLeg","") + GetHealth("RightFoot","") + GetHealth("LeftFoot","");
3373 avgLegHealth *= 0.25; //divide by 4 to make the average leg health;
3374
3375 if (IsSwimming())
3376 {
3377 //swimming other than forward is not detectable in script other than through velocity check
3378 vector v;
3379 PhysicsGetVelocity(v);
3380
3381 if(v.LengthSq() > 0)
3382 {
3383 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_SHOCK_SWIM);
3384 }
3385 }
3386 else if (m_MovementState.m_iMovement != 0)
3387 {
3388 if ( IsClimbingLadder() )
3389 {
3390 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK);
3391 }
3392 else if( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_ERECT || m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDERECT)
3393 {
3394 if ( m_MovementState.m_iMovement > 1)//only jog and faster
3395 {
3396 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK);
3397 }
3398 }
3399 else if( m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_CROUCH || m_MovementState.m_iStanceIdx == DayZPlayerConstants.STANCEIDX_RAISEDCROUCH)
3400 {
3401 //any speed other than idle
3402 MovingShock(avgLegHealth, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_HIGH_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_MID_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER, PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_SHOCK_WALK * PlayerConstants.BROKEN_CROUCH_MODIFIER);
3403 }
3404 }
3405 else
3406 {
3407 //Here apply shock if player is standing or crouched and STANDING STILL
3408 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_STAND_SHOCK);
3409 }
3410
3411 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
3412 }
3413 }

◆ CalculateVisibilityForAI()

void ManBase::CalculateVisibilityForAI ( )
inlineprivate

Definition at line 4637 of file playerbase.c.

4638 {
4639 const int VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT = 10;
4640
4641 int attcount = GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
4642 float sumVisibility = 0;
4643 float countVisibility = 0;
4644 float visibilityMean = 0;
4645
4646 if (attcount > 0)
4647 {
4648 for (int att = 0; att < attcount; att++)
4649 {
4650 EntityAI attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(att);
4651 if ( attachment.IsClothing() )
4652 {
4653 ClothingBase clothing;
4654 Class.CastTo(clothing, attachment);
4655 sumVisibility += clothing.GetItemVisibility();
4656 countVisibility++;
4657 }
4658 }
4659
4660 visibilityMean = (sumVisibility + (VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT - countVisibility)) / VISIBILITY_SLOTS_COUNT;
4661 SetVisibilityCoef(visibilityMean);
4662 }
4663 else
4664 {
4665 visibilityMean = 1;
4666 SetVisibilityCoef(visibilityMean);
4667 }
4668 }

870 m_ActionManager.Interrupt();
871
872 if ( ammo.ToType().IsInherited(Nonlethal_Base) )
873 {
874 //Print("PlayerBase | EEHitBy | nonlethal hit");
875 AddHealth("","Health",-ConvertNonlethalDamage(damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Shock")));
876 if (dmgZone != "Head")
877 AddHealth(dmgZone,"Health",-damageResult.GetDamage(dmgZone,"Shock")); //Also deal damage to zone health, no dmg reduction
878 }
879
880 if (GetGame().IsServer())
881 {
882 if ( GetHealth("RightLeg", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("LeftLeg", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("RightFoot", "Health") <= 1 || GetHealth("LeftFoot", "Health") <= 1 )
883 {
884 if ( GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS ) )//effectively resets the modifier
885 {
886 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateModifier( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS );
887 }
888 GetModifiersManager().ActivateModifier( eModifiers.MDF_BROKEN_LEGS );
889 }
890 }
891
892 //m_ShockHandler.SetShock(damageResult.GetDamage("", "Shock")); //TESTING
893 m_ShockHandler.CheckValue(true);
894
895 //analytics
896 GetGame().GetAnalyticsServer().OnEntityHit( source, this );
897 }

◆ FindCargoByBaseType()

EntityAI ManBase::FindCargoByBaseType ( string  searched_item)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 1919 of file playerbase.c.

1920 {
1921 EntityAI attachment;
1922 string item_name;
1923 int attcount = this.GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
1924
1925 for (int att = 0; att < attcount; att++)
1926 {
1927 attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(att);
1928 if ( attachment.IsItemBase() )
1929 {
1930 item_name = attachment.GetType();
1931 if ( GetGame().IsKindOf(item_name, searched_item) )
1932 {
1933 return attachment;
1934 }
1935 }
1936 }
1937 return NULL;
1938 }

◆ FixAllInventoryItems()

◆ GetImmunity()

float ManBase::GetImmunity ( )
inlineprivate

returns player's immunity strength between 0..1

Definition at line 4857 of file playerbase.c.

4858 {
4859 float immunity;
4860 if( GetPlayerStats() )
4861 {
4862 float max_health = GetMaxHealth("GlobalHealth", "Health") + 0.01;//addition to prevent divisioin by zero in case of some messup
4863 float max_blood = GetMaxHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood") + 0.01;//addition to prevent divisioin by zero in case of some messup
4864 float energy_normalized = GetStatEnergy().Get() / PlayerConstants.SL_ENERGY_MAX;
4865 float water_normalized = GetStatWater().Get() / PlayerConstants.SL_WATER_MAX;
4866 float health_normalized = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Health") / max_health;
4867 float blood_normalized = GetHealth("GlobalHealth", "Blood") / max_blood;
4868 immunity = energy_normalized + water_normalized + health_normalized + blood_normalized;
4869 immunity = immunity / 4;//avg
4870 immunity = Math.Clamp(immunity,0,1);
4871 }
4872 return immunity;
4873 }

◆ GetMagazineToReload()

EntityAI ManBase::GetMagazineToReload ( EntityAI  weapon)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 4407 of file playerbase.c.

4408 {
4409 Weapon_Base weapon_base = Weapon_Base.Cast( weapon );
4410 WeaponManager weapon_manager = GetWeaponManager();
4411 EntityAI magazine_to_reload;
4412
4413 EntityAI ammo_magazine; //magazine
4414 int last_ammo_magazine_count;
4415 int ammo_magazine_count;
4416
4417 EntityAI ammo_pile; //ammo pile
4418 int last_ammo_pile_count;
4419 int ammo_pile_count;
4420
4421 //Get all magazines in (player) inventory
4422 for ( int att_i = 0; att_i < GetInventory().AttachmentCount(); ++att_i )
4423 {
4424 EntityAI attachment = GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex( att_i );
4425 ref CargoBase attachment_cargo = attachment.GetInventory().GetCargo();
4426
4427 if ( attachment_cargo )
4428 {
4429 for ( int cgo_i = 0; cgo_i < attachment_cargo.GetItemCount(); ++cgo_i )
4430 {
4431 EntityAI cargo_item = attachment_cargo.GetItem( cgo_i );
4432
4433 //check for proper magazine
4434 if ( cargo_item.IsMagazine() )
4435 {
4436 Magazine magazine = Magazine.Cast( cargo_item );
4437 ammo_pile_count = magazine.GetAmmoCount();
4438
4439 //magazines (get magazine with max ammo count)
4440 if ( weapon_manager.CanAttachMagazine( weapon_base, magazine ) || weapon_manager.CanSwapMagazine( weapon_base, magazine ) )
4441 {
4442 if ( ammo_pile_count > 0 )
4443 {
4444 if ( last_ammo_magazine_count == 0 )
4445 {
4446 ammo_magazine = magazine;
4447 last_ammo_magazine_count = ammo_pile_count;
4448 }
4449 else
4450 {
4451 if ( last_ammo_magazine_count < ammo_pile_count )
4452 {
4453 ammo_magazine = magazine;
4454 last_ammo_magazine_count = ammo_pile_count;
4455 }
4456 }
4457 }
4458 }
4459 //bullets (get ammo pile with min ammo count)
4460 else if ( weapon_manager.CanLoadBullet( weapon_base, magazine ) )
4461 {
4462 if ( ammo_pile_count > 0 )
4463 {
4464 if ( last_ammo_pile_count == 0 )
4465 {
4466 ammo_pile = magazine;
4467 last_ammo_pile_count = ammo_pile_count;
4468 }
4469 else
4470 {
4471 if ( last_ammo_pile_count > ammo_pile_count )
4472 {
4473 ammo_pile = magazine;
4474 last_ammo_pile_count = ammo_pile_count;
4475 }
4476 }
4477 }
4478 }
4479 }
4480 }
4481 }
4482 }
4483
4484 //prioritize magazine
4485 if ( ammo_magazine )
4486 {
4487 return ammo_magazine;
4488 }
4489
4490 return ammo_pile;
4491 }

represents base for cargo storage for entities

◆ HandleRemoteItemManipulation()

bool ManBase::HandleRemoteItemManipulation ( int  userDataType,
ParamsReadContext  ctx 
)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 5871 of file playerbase.c.

5872 {
5873 if( userDataType == INPUT_UDT_ITEM_MANIPULATION )
5874 {
5875 int type = -1;
5876 ItemBase item1 = null;
5877 ItemBase item2 = null;
5878 bool use_stack_max = false;
5879 int slot_id = -1;
5880
5881 if (!ctx.Read(type))
5882 return false;
5883
5884 if (type == 4)
5885 {
5886 if (!ctx.Read(item1))
5887 return false;
5888 InventoryLocation dst = new InventoryLocation;
5889 if (dst.ReadFromContext(ctx))
5890 {
5891 //Print(InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(dst));
5892 bool dummy;
5893 if (ctx.Read(dummy))
5894 item1.SplitItemToInventoryLocation(dst);
5895 else
5896 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxToInventoryLocation(dst);
5897 return true;
5898 }
5899 return false;
5900 }
5901
5902 if (!ctx.Read(item1))
5903 return false;
5904 if (!ctx.Read(item2))
5905 return false;
5906 if (!ctx.Read(use_stack_max))
5907 return false;
5908 if (!ctx.Read(slot_id))
5909 return false;
5910
5911 if ( type == -1 && item1 && item2 )//combine
5912 {
5913 item1.CombineItems( item2, use_stack_max );
5914 }
5915 else if ( type == 1 && item1 )
5916 {
5917 if ( use_stack_max )
5918 item1.SplitIntoStackMax(item2, slot_id, this);
5919 else
5920 item1.SplitItem(this);
5921 }
5922 else if ( type == 2 && item1 )
5923 {
5924 int row, col;
5925 if ( !ctx.Read( row ) )
5926 return false;
5927 if ( !ctx.Read( col ) )
5928 return false;
5929 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxCargo( item2, slot_id, row, col );
5930 }
5931 else if ( type == 3 && item1 )
5932 {
5933 item1.SplitIntoStackMaxHands( this );
5934 }
5935 return true;
5936 }
5937 return false;
5938 }

390 {

392 PluginConfigDebugProfile m_ConfigDebugProfile = PluginConfigDebugProfile.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginConfigDebugProfile) );
393 PluginDeveloper m_Developer = PluginDeveloper.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginDeveloper) );
394
395 PlayerBase player = this;
396
397 if( m_ConfigDebugProfile )
398 {
399 string default_preset = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetDefaultPreset();
400 if ( player && default_preset != "" )
401 {
402 TStringArray preset_array = new TStringArray;
403 m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetPresetItems( default_preset, preset_array );
404
405 bool is_preset_fixed = true;
406 if ( preset_array.Count() == 0 )
407 {
408 m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetPresetItems( default_preset, preset_array );
409 is_preset_fixed = false;
410 }
411
412 if ( preset_array.Count() > 0 )
413 {
414 m_Developer.ClearInventory(player);
415
416 for (int i = 0; i < preset_array.Count(); i++)
417 {
418 float health = -1;
419 int quantity = -1;
420 if ( is_preset_fixed )
421 {
422 health = m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetItemHealth( default_preset, i );
423 quantity = m_ConfigDebugProfileFixed.GetItemQuantity( default_preset, i );
424 }
425 else
426 {
427 health = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetItemHealth( default_preset, i );
428 quantity = m_ConfigDebugProfile.GetItemQuantity( default_preset, i );
429 }
430 m_Developer.SpawnEntityInInventory(player, preset_array.Get(i), health, quantity );
431 }
432 }
433 }
434 }
435 }
436

◆ IsFacingTarget()

bool ManBase::IsFacingTarget ( Object  target)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 4137 of file playerbase.c.

4138 {
4139 vector pdir = GetDirection();
4140 vector ptv = target.GetPosition() - GetPosition();
4141 pdir.Normalize();
4142 ptv.Normalize();
4143 //MessageAction(ToString(pdir)+" "+ToString(ptv)+" ");
4144 if (Math.AbsFloat(pdir[0]-ptv[0]) < 0.5 && Math.AbsFloat(pdir[2]-ptv[2]) < 0.5 )
4145 {
4146 return true;
4147 }
4148 return false;
4149 }

8233 {
8234 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
8235 if (item1.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)
8236 item_hands = item1;
8237 if (item2.GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il) && il.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)

inlineprivate

Definition at line 4086 of file playerbase.c.

4087 {
4088 array<vector> temp = new array<vector>;
4089 temp = GetGame().GetMission().GetActiveRefresherLocations();
4090 int count = temp.Count();
4091 if (count > 0)
4092 {
4093 vector pos = target.GetPosition();

4095 {
4096 if ( vector.Distance(pos,temp.Get(i)) < GameConstants.REFRESHER_RADIUS )
4097 return true;
4098 }

4101 }

4104 return false;

Definition at line 3416 of file playerbase.c.

3417 {
3418 if (legHealth <= PlayerConstants.BROKEN_LEGS_LOW_HEALTH_THRESHOLD)
3419 {
3420 //Inflict "high shock"
3421 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(highShock);
3422 }

3424 {
3425 //Inflict "low shock"
3426 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(lowShock);
3427 }
3428 else
3429 {
3430 //If neither high nore low, inflict "mid shock"
3431 m_ShockHandler.SetShock(midShock);

◆ NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer()

override bool ManBase::NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer ( notnull EntityAI  item,
EntityAI  currParent,
EntityAI  newParent 
)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 4568 of file playerbase.c.

4569 {
4570 if (GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
4571 {
4572 DayZPlayerInstanceType t = GetInstanceType();
4573 switch (t)
4574 {
4575 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_SINGLEPLAYER:
4576 return false;
4577 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_CLIENT:
4578 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_SERVER:
4579 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_SERVER:
4580 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_AI_REMOTE:
4581 case DayZPlayerInstanceType.INSTANCETYPE_REMOTE:
4582 return true; // Might help mitigate "megabugged" (desync)
4583
4584 syncDebugPrint("[syncinv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer item=" + Object.GetDebugName(item) + " currPar=" + currParent + " newPar=" + newParent);
4585
4586 bool i_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(item);
4587
4588 bool cp_owned = false;
4589 if (currParent)
4590 cp_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(currParent);
4591
4592 bool np_owned = false;
4593 if (newParent)
4594 np_owned = GetHumanInventory().HasEntityInInventory(newParent);
4595
4596 bool all_owned = i_owned && cp_owned && (np_owned || (newParent == null));
4597 syncDebugPrint("[syncinv] " + GetDebugName(this) + " STS=" + GetSimulationTimeStamp() + " NeedInventoryJunctureFromServer=" + !all_owned + " i_pwn=" + i_owned + " cp_pwn=" + cp_owned + " np_pwn=" + np_owned);
4598
4599 return !all_owned;
4600 default:
4601 Error("[syncinv] unsupported instance type t=" + t);
4602 break;
4603 }
4604 }
4605 return false;
4606 }
syncDebugPrint
void syncDebugPrint(string s)

Definition: particlemanager.c:436

2544 }
2545 #endif

4194 return;
4195
4196 EntityAI inHandEntity = GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
4197

4199 return; // player is already performing some animation
4200

4212 }
4213 }
4214 else

4222 {

4231
4232 if ( Reserved_Item_il )
4233 inHandEntityFSwapDst.CopyLocationFrom(Reserved_Item_il, true);
4234

4236 {

4238 PredictiveSwapEntities( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity );
4239 }
4240 else if ( GameInventory.CanForceSwapEntitiesEx( quickBarEntity, null, inHandEntity, inHandEntityFSwapDst ) )
4241 {
4242 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Swap - PredictiveForceSwapEntities HND=" + Object.GetDebugName(inHandEntity) + " QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity) + " fswap_dst=" + InventoryLocation.DumpToStringNullSafe(inHandEntityFSwapDst));
4243 PredictiveForceSwapEntities( quickBarEntity, inHandEntity, inHandEntityFSwapDst );
4244 }
4245 }
4246 else
4247 {
4248 if ( GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation(quickBarEntity,handInventoryLocation) )
4249 return;
4250
4251 if ( GetInventory().CanAddEntityIntoHands(quickBarEntity) )
4252 {
4253 syncDebugPrint("[QB] Stash - PredictiveTakeEntityToHands QB=" + Object.GetDebugName(quickBarEntity));
4254 PredictiveTakeEntityToHands( quickBarEntity );
4255 }

4257 }

2482 if( m_ModifiersManager ) m_ModifiersManager.OnScheduledTick(deltaTime);
2483 if( m_NotifiersManager ) m_NotifiersManager.OnScheduledTick();
2484 if( m_TrasferValues ) m_TrasferValues.OnScheduledTick(deltaTime);
2485 if( m_VirtualHud ) m_VirtualHud.OnScheduledTick();
2486 if( GetBleedingManagerServer() ) GetBleedingManagerServer().OnTick(deltaTime);
2487
2488 // Check if electric device needs to be unplugged
2489 ItemBase heldItem = GetItemInHands();
2490 if ( heldItem && heldItem.HasEnergyManager() && heldItem.GetCompEM().IsPlugged() )
2491 {
2492 // Now we know we are working with an electric device which is plugged into a power source.
2493 EntityAI placed_entity = heldItem;
2494
2495 // Unplug the device when the player is too far from the power source.
2496 placed_entity.GetCompEM().UpdatePlugState();
2497 }
2498 }

References IsAlive(), IsPlayerSelected(), and m_VirtualHud.

SyncJunctures

Definition at line 7567 of file playerbase.c.

7568 {
7569 super.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7570
7571 switch( pJunctureID )
7572 {
7573 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INJURY:
7574 eInjuryHandlerLevels level;
7575 bool enable;
7576 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadInjuryParams(pCtx, enable, level);
7577 m_InjuryHandler.SetInjuryCommandParams(enable, level);
7578 break;
7579 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_PLAYER_STATES:
7580 GetSymptomManager().SetAnimation(pCtx);
7581 break;
7582 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_QUICKBAR_SET_SHORTCUT:
7583 OnQuickbarSetEntityRequest(pCtx);
7584 break;
7585 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INVENTORY:
7586 GetInventory().OnInventoryJunctureFromServer(pCtx);
7587 break;
7588 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_INVENTORY_REPAIR:
7589 GetInventory().OnInventoryJunctureRepairFromServer(pCtx);
7590 break;
7591 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_INTERRUPT:
7592 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_ACK_ACCEPT:
7593 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ACTION_ACK_REJECT:
7594 m_ActionManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID,pCtx);
7595 break;
7596 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_ACTION_ACK_ACCEPT:
7597 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_ACTION_ACK_REJECT:
7598 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_SET_JAMMING_CHANCE:
7599 m_WeaponManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID,pCtx);
7600 break;
7601 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_UNCONSCIOUSNESS:
7602 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadPlayerUnconsciousnessParams(pCtx, m_ShouldBeUnconscious);
7603 break;
7604 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_PLAYER_ADD_MODIFIER:
7605 GetSymptomManager().SetAnimation(pCtx);
7606 break;
7607 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_KURU_REQUEST:
7608 float amount;
7609 if(DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadKuruRequest(pCtx, amount))
7610 {
7611 if(GetAimingModel() && IsFireWeaponRaised())
7612 {
7613 GetAimingModel().RequestKuruShake(amount);
7614 }
7615 }
7616 break;
7617 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_GESTURE_REQUEST :
7618 m_EmoteManager.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7619 break;
7620 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_WEAPON_LIFT:
7621 SetLiftWeapon(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7622 break;
7623 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_ADS_RESET:
7624 m_ResetADS = true;
7625 break;
7626 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_DELETE_ITEM:
7627 SetToDelete(pCtx);
7628 break;
7629 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_BROKEN_LEGS:
7630 m_BrokenLegsJunctureReceived = true;
7631 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadBrokenLegsParamsEx(pCtx, m_BrokenLegState);
7632 break;
7633 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_SHOCK :
7634 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.ReadShockParams(pCtx, m_CurrentShock);
7635 break;
7636 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_STAMINA:
7637 m_StaminaHandler.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7638 break;
7639 case DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SJ_STAMINA_MISC:
7640 m_StaminaHandler.OnSyncJuncture(pJunctureID, pCtx);
7641 break;
7642 }
7643 }

7164 {
7165 //clear stomach content
7166 GetStomach().ClearContents();
7167

7169 if( m_BleedingManagerServer )
7170 m_BleedingManagerServer.RemoveAllSources();
7171
7172 // Modifiers
7173 bool is_area_exposure, is_mask;
7174
7175 if( GetModifiersManager() )
7176 {
7177 is_mask = GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_MASK);
7178 is_area_exposure = GetModifiersManager().IsModifierActive(eModifiers.MDF_AREAEXPOSURE);
7179 GetModifiersManager().DeactivateAllModifiers();
7180 }
7181
7182

7187

7190 {

7194 }
7195

7197 if( m_AgentPool )
7198 m_AgentPool.RemoveAllAgents();
7199
7200 // Damage System
7201 DamageZoneMap zones = new DamageZoneMap;
7202 DamageSystem.GetDamageZoneMap(this,zones);
7203 SetHealth("", "Health", GetMaxHealth("","Health"));
7204 SetHealth("", "Shock", GetMaxHealth("","Shock"));
7205 SetHealth("", "Blood", GetMaxHealth("","Blood"));
7206
7207 for( int i = 0; i < zones.Count(); i++ )
7208 {
7209 string zone = zones.GetKey(i);
7210 SetHealth(zone, "Health", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Health"));
7211 SetHealth(zone, "Shock", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Shock"));
7212 SetHealth(zone, "Blood", GetMaxHealth(zone,"Blood"));
7213 }
7214 // uncon
7215 if(IsUnconscious())
7216 DayZPlayerSyncJunctures.SendPlayerUnconsciousness(this, false);
7217
7218 // set max
7219 if( set_max )
7220 {
7221 GetStatWater().Set(GetStatWater().GetMax());
7222 GetStatEnergy().Set(GetStatEnergy().GetMax());
7223 }
7224
7225
7226 // fix up inventory
7227 FixAllInventoryItems();
7228

7230 PluginLifespan module_lifespan = PluginLifespan.Cast( GetPlugin( PluginLifespan ) );
7231 module_lifespan.UpdateBloodyHandsVisibilityEx( this, eBloodyHandsTypes.CLEAN );
7232 }

)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 5388 of file playerbase.c.

5389 {
5390 if ( enable ) // enable
5391 {
5392 // We assume that if this is set to true the PPE is already active
5393 if ( m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled == enable )
5394 return;
5395
5396 if ( aroundId !=0 )
5397 {
5398 if (!m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer)
5399 {
5400 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld( aroundId, GetPosition());
5401 }
5402 // First entry in an area with dynamic tweaks to particles
5403 if ( partDynaUpdate )
5404 {
5405 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.SetParameter( 0, EmitorParam.BIRTH_RATE, newBirthRate );
5406 }
5407 }
5408
5409 if ( !m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny && tinyId !=0 )
5410 {
5411 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny = ParticleManager.GetInstance().PlayInWorld( tinyId, GetPosition() );
5412 }
5413
5414 if ( ppeIdx != -1 )
5415 {
5416 PPERequesterBase ppeRequester;
5417 if ( Class.CastTo( ppeRequester, PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( ppeIdx ) ) )
5418 ppeRequester.Start();
5419 }
5420
5421 // We start playing the ambient sound
5422 if (!m_AmbientContamination && soundset != "")
5423 PlaySoundSetLoop( m_AmbientContamination, soundset, 0.1, 0.1 );
5424
5425 m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled = enable;
5426 }
5427 else // disable
5428 {
5429 if ( m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer )
5430 {
5431 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer.Stop();
5432 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayer = null;
5433 }
5434
5435 if (m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny)
5436 {
5437 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny.Stop();
5438 m_ContaminatedAroundPlayerTiny = null;
5439 }
5440 if (ppeIdx != -1)
5441 PPERequesterBank.GetRequester( ppeIdx ).Stop(new Param1<bool>(true)); //fade out
5442
5443 // We stop the ambient sound
5444 if ( m_AmbientContamination )
5445 StopSoundSet( m_AmbientContamination );
5446
5447 // We make sure to reset the state
5448 m_ContaminatedAreaEffectEnabled = enable;
5449 }
5450 }

8614// ErrorEx("DbgFlies | StopSoundSet | exit 3 ",ErrorExSeverity.INFO );

8616 break;
8617 }

7682 {
7683 EntityAI itemToDelete;
7684
7685 if (GetGame().IsClient() && GetGame().IsMultiplayer())
7686 {
7687 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation();

7689 {

7694 }
7695

7700 }
7701 }

7710 }
